rule: The output must include exactly one of the two categories: "funny" or "not funny" and nothing else.
input: Why was the math book sad? Because it had too many problems.
validity:
The provided input is a joke. It includes a setup ("Why was the math book sad?") and a punchline ("Because it had too many problems."), forming a complete joke. The length of the joke is not restricted by the input specification, and it is delivered in English, which is acceptable as the joke can be in any language. There are no violations of the input specification. 

OK
